The film stars Simon Abkarian as Ahmed Al-Fateh, Homayoun Ershadi as Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, Daniel Lapaine as Richard Dearlove, Mike Colter as James Rayburne, Parker Sawyers as William Foster Shawyer, Jessica Chastain as Margaret "Peggy" Geller, Mark Duplass as Richard Dreyfuss, and Mark Valley as John Fitzgerald "Jack" Bauer. "Zero Dark Thirty" received widespread critical acclaim, with many praising the film's strong performances, intricate plotlines, and powerful themes. The film was also praised for its commitment to realism and attention to detail, which helped to create a sense of authenticity and immersion in the story.
